column4: so i updated from 9.04 to 9.10, it totally borked my install, when i try to boot it up it says something about a mountall errror terminated with status 127
anyone else run into that problem? I searched forums and people just said to reformat
ouch, I would try to recover any data I could before a reformat.
oh, well, I never have.  I had too many problems with Windows upgrades in the past.
